summary: REQ-19 and REQ-20 appear implemented in the success view by URL-encoding the filename in the src and adding onError fallback UI. However, REQ-21 cannot be confirmed from the diff because the required image file was not added (no new public asset file in the diff), and repository-wide removal/avoidance of other similarly-named image references cannot be fully verified from the provided changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the frontend static assets include the success image file in the deployable public directory at the exact path "frontend/public/assets/generated/Kanni 14.PNG" (capital K, space, .PNG extension), and remove/avoid any references on the success screen to other similarly-named files.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, so the required static image file presence at the exact path cannot be verified/implemented from these changes. Also, the diff only shows updates in App.tsx and index.html, so it cannot conclusively prove there are no other references elsewhere in the repo.
evidence: File diff summary: "Added: 0" (no new asset file added)

hallucinated_features.description: Added a loading/skeleton state for the success image (heart pulse placeholder shown until image loads).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-19/20/21 do not request a loading indicator/state management beyond reliable rendering and error fallback.

hallucinated_features.description: Preloading the success image via <link rel='preload' as='image'> in index.html.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested by REQ-19/20/21 (though it may help reliability).
